Name: ToyLand
About the game: Help Hana, who has fallen into the world of abandoned toys, 'Toyland', return to the real world!! If you defend at the right timing of the enemy's attack, you can parry, and you can create a command attack by combining weak and heavy mouse attacks. Combine the attacks to defeat the toys and the boss King Crown that attack one, and listen to the story behind them!! Toyland is a 3D back view hack and slash game where you advance while defeating the waves of enemies. Feel the cool action feeling in Toy Land! Do you remember playing with your eldest son when you were little? If you remember playing with toys, where are the older boys now? Here is Toyland, a world of toys forgotten and abandoned by their owners! - This game supports operation through a gamepad.
